Royal troubadour boots

Royal troubadour boots
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Feet
Value: 25
Keyword: Regional
Search
Keywords: 		Erdwise
GDTE
Trinketry
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

They may not be the same colour, but they sure are swanky.

The Royal troubadour boots item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • Have [10] Erdwise faction reputation.

Attributes

+8% Chest finding While doing Trinketry.
+2% Double action While doing Trinketry.
+5% Chance to find 1 to 10 gold pieces While doing Trinketry.
While in the GDTE area.

Uses

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Payment
Mysterious Merchant 5

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Chest of Erdwise 1 2.500% 9.631% ~1 in 10

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Price
Mysterious Merchant 20

Gear Sets

Trivia

  • This item is part of the Royal Troubadour Set.
